Action Items from Team Meeting - January 15, 2025

Sarah mentioned we need an architecture review session for the new microservices. 
Proposed: Thursday Feb 6th afternoon, 3-4 hours
Tom will book the 8th floor conference room + send Zoom link
Invite backend team, David (DevOps), Lisa (Security)

expected_json.description: Deep dive on the new microservices architecture
